subject: Football
Domestic Violence
Series
Police
Police Brutality, Misconduct and Shootings
lead_paragraph: A domestic abuse case involving Phillip Merling, a former Miami Dolphin, provides an example of lenient treatment of players by law enforcement agencies whose employees work off-duty jobs for football teams.
snippet: A domestic abuse case involving Phillip Merling, a former Miami Dolphin, provides an example of lenient treatment of players by law enforcement agencies whose employees work off-duty jobs for football teams.
